changelog:
New permissions required to access location in background and to access photo, video and audio files.[249]
Background apps can no longer jump into the foreground.[249]
Limited access to non-resettable device identifiers.[249]
Background (idle) access to camera, microphone and sensors disabled for more privacy protection with the side effect of disabling antitheft software.[250][251][252]
Sharing shortcuts, which allow sharing content with a contact directly.[249]
Floating settings panel, that allows changing system settings directly from apps.[249]
Dynamic depth format for photos, which allow changing background blur after taking a photo.[249]
Support for the AV1 video codec, the HDR10+ video format and the Opus audio codec.[249]
Support for aptX Adaptive, LHDC, LLAC, CELT and AAC LATM codecs[253][254]
A native MIDI API, allowing interaction with music controllers.[249]
Better support for biometric authentication in apps.[249]
Support for the WPA3 Wi-Fi security protocol.[249]
Support for foldable phones.[249]
Support for Notification Bubbles.[255][256]
New system-wide dark theme/mode[257][258]
Project Mainline, allows core OS components to be updated via the Google Play Store, without requiring a complete system update[259]
